A

Aggressor - Interface in <Unnamed>
Aggressors react to creatures they encounter.
Animal - Class in <Unnamed>
Animals move around and eat plants.
Animal() - Constructor for class Animal
Creates an animal with 1 health point.
attack(Creature) - Method in interface Aggressor
 
attack(Creature) - Method in class Animal
If the creature we've encountered is a plant, we'll eat it.
Aware - Interface in <Unnamed>
Aware creatures can sense others creatures around them.

C

Creature - Class in <Unnamed>
Creature is the base class for all creatures in the game.
Creature() - Constructor for class Creature
 
CreatureHandler - Class in <Unnamed>
The "brains" of the game, which controls all of the creature activites.
CreatureHandler(int, int, List<Creature>) - Constructor for class CreatureHandler
 

G

Game - Class in <Unnamed>
The starting class of the game.

getColor() - Method in class Plant
 
getCreatures() - Method in class CreatureHandler
Retrieves all of the creatures that exist in the world

Gets the location of the creature in game coordinates.

isAlive() - Method in class Plant
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Game
main() simply creates an instance of the Game class and calls its run() function.
Movable - Interface in <Unnamed>
Aggressors react to creatures they encounter.
move() - Method in class Animal
Move the animal in a random direction.
move() - Method in interface Movable
Moves the Creature.

P

paint(Graphics) - Method in class World
 
Plant - Class in <Unnamed>
Plants sit there and look green, waiting to be eaten.
Plant() - Constructor for class Plant
Creates a plant with 1 health point.

R

run() - Method in class Game
Launches the game.
run() - Method in class World
This function is called on the background thread by virtue of the Runnable interface.

S

senseNeighbors(Creature, Creature, Creature, Creature) - Method in interface Aware
This method is called every frame and indicates what creatures are nearby.
setLocation(Point) - Method in class Creature
Sets the location of the creature in game coordinates.
setStartingPositions() - Method in class CreatureHandler
Sets the initial positions of the creatures to random locations within the world's grid.
Shape - Enum in <Unnamed>
Shapes that can be used to draw creatures.

T

takeDamage(int) - Method in class Creature
Allows the creature to take damage if something comes by to attack it.

U

updateCreatures() - Method in class CreatureHandler
Updates all of the living creatures in the game by making they each get a chance to act on their implemented behaviors.

V

valueOf(String) - Static method in enum Shape
Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
values() - Static method in enum Shape
Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.

W

World - Class in <Unnamed>
Handles drawing and the passage of time in the world.
World(List<Creature>) - Constructor for class World
Initializes the world, the drawing window, and starts the update thread in the background.
